multiple_choice.question: What does Khalai want to do under the shade of the tree?
What does Khalai want to do with flowers?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: Khalai wakes up and talks to the orange tree
Khalai talks to the hedge round her school
Please, grow strong and protect us from bad people

meanings.ripe: fruit developed to the point of readiness for harvesting and eating
meanings.hedge: a fence or boundary formed by closely growing bushes
meanings.perhaps: used to express uncertainty or possibility
